entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a
